input.content: You will be prompted with a sentence in Belarusian. Your output must be a single Belarusian sentence, the result of Belarusian => Russian => Belarusian translation of the input. Please note: it must not be Russian, it must be the final result of translating into Russian and then back into Belarusian.
Вялікая адказнасць ляжыць на старшыні калгаса.

ideal: Вялікая адказнасць ляжыць на старшыні калгаса.
